scripts.pack: npm run pack-mac && npm run pack-win-ia32 && npm run pack-win-x64
scripts.pack-mac: electron-packager . --platform darwin --arch x64 --overwrite --out builds && electron-installer-zip builds/*-darwin-x64 builds/mac.zip
scripts.pack-win-ia32: electron-packager . --platform win32 --arch ia32 --overwrite --out builds && electron-installer-zip builds/*-win32-ia32 builds/win32.zip
scripts.pack-win-x64: electron-packager . --platform win32 --arch x64 --overwrite --out builds && electron-installer-zip builds/*-win32-x64 builds/win64.zip
